name: Detonation Derby
description:
Detonation Derby is a 2v2 team based local multiplayer party game in which players roll around as bombs and collecting plasma. Use the plasma to construct a mega bomb and plant it at opposing team’s base! When a team’s base is destroyed, they can no longer respawn, and once they are eliminated they lose! Players can self-destruct in order to blow up opposing team members, and can throw their teammates across the field to create an explosion, and reach the mega-plasma.

Credit: David, Jack, Seth, Nelson
